description.text: Service Pack 2 for SQL Server 2016 upgraded all SQL Server 2016 instances and components installed through the SQL Server setup.  Service Pack 2 can upgrade all editions of SQL Server 2016 to Service Pack 2 level. For customers in need of additional installation options, please visit the Microsoft Download Center and download the Service Pack 2 SQL Server 2016. To learn more about SQL Server 2016 SP2 please visit the Microsoft Support (http://support.microsoft.com) Knowledge Base article KB 4052908.
